attributes.action: National insurance paid to stay at home mums and dads
attributes.additional_details: Parents who choose to look after their children should be respected not disregarded like we have been in, we never take time off and work very hard to try and make sure our children get the best which is hard. We should at least get a tax break where we don't have to pay national insurance until our children are at a certain age (school age) so we are entitled to a pension etc when older as I cannot afford these payments while not working. There should be more for stay at home mums and dads as we deserve it.
